'''Alpha v1.0.17_03'''<ref name="won"/> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on August 23, 2010,<ref name="won">[[wordofnotch:998637682|Minecraft Alpha v1.0.17_03, Finland, and Metagun]] – The Word of Notch, August 23, 2010</ref> which fixed an item duplication bug and improved performance.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed an item duplication bug.{{more info|what exactly?}}
* Improved framerate.
* Attempted to fix a bug with players getting stuck in blocks.</onlyinclude>
